# init(title:style:target:action:)

**Initializer**

Creates an item using the specified title, style, target, and action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(title: String?, style: UIBarButtonItem.Style, target: Any?, action: Selector?)
```

## Parameters

- **title**: The item’s title. If `nil`, a title doesn’t appear.
- **style**: The style of the item. For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem/Style-swift.enum].
- **target**: The object that receives the `action` message.
- **action**: The action to send to `target` when a person selects this item.

## Return Value

A newly initialized [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem].

## Related Documentation

- **init(barButtonSystemItem:target:action:)**: Creates an item using the specified system item, target, and action.

## Creating items of a specific style

- **init(image:style:target:action:)**: Creates an item using the specified image, style, target, and action.
- **init(image:landscapeImagePhone:style:target:action:)**: Creates an item using the specified images, style, target, and action.
